dcterms:subject: Loan
sugawara:personRoleA: Muhammad Rahim Akhund waladi Husayn Jan
sugawara:seal: Tahir Akhund Makhdum b. Molla Sharif Khalifam merhum
schema:abstract: Muhammad Rahim Akhund XXXXXX b. Muhammad Husayn Jan from Shir Khwaja Mahalla of [Kashghar Old] Citystates that he borrowed 2 misqal of money from his hemshir Huz Bibi and promised pay it back by her request.
schema:grant: <KAKENHI> 研究費 (Japan Society for the Promotion of Science)
